attributes.action: Intervene to save BBC Radio 6 - 6 Music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the PM to intervene and save BBC Radio 6 - 6 Music,

There are so many more opportunities for the BBC to save money, not least reducing the pay of the celebrities that are welcome take their unique and often nauseating skills to commercial telly, but leave 6 Music alone.

The BBC need to promote it, not cut it.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
